thread.title: BRIEF-Hyster-Yale Materials Handling Says Entered Into Amendment Of Co's $200 Mln Original Principal Amount Term Loan​

title: BRIEF-Hyster-Yale Materials Handling Says Entered Into Amendment Of Co's $200 Mln Original Principal Amount Term Loan​

organizations.name: mln original principal amount term loan​ reuters staff

text: March 20, 2018 / 9:30 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Hyster-Yale Materials Handling Says Entered Into Amendment Of Co's $200 Mln Original Principal Amount Term Loan​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Hyster-Yale Materials Handling Inc : * HYSTER-YALE MATERIALS HANDLING INC - ‍ON MARCH 14, ENTERED INTO AN AMENDMENT OF COMPANY’S $200.0 MILLION ORIGINAL PRINCIPAL AMOUNT TERM LOAN - SEC FILING​ * HYSTER-YALE MATERIALS HANDLING-‍TERM LOAN AMENDMENT ALLOWS FOR DISPOSITION OF ANY OTHER NON-CORE ASSETS WITH BOOK VALUE NOT TO EXCEED $10.0 MILLION​ * HYSTER-YALE MATERIALS HANDLING-‍TERM LOAN AMENDMENT ALLOWS FOR CO'S DISPOSITION OF ALL OR ANY PORTION OF POWER TAP ASSETS OF NUVERA FUEL CELLS, LLC​ Source text - bit.ly/2prwGpM Further company coverage:
